description: Named after the famed and rifling righthand pointbreak not too far from the town of Huatulco, Barra (de la Cruz) provided their surf-starved souls a glutinous feast. With colors inspired by traditional Mexican blankets, the Barra Scrambler is a lightweight polar fleece that kept us toasty while camping beneath those starry, Oaxacan nights.
name: Roark Barra Scrambler Fleece - Mens
